query:
UPDATE tickets SET 
         escalated_to = $2, 
         escalated_at = NOW(),
         priority = CASE WHEN priority = 'low' THEN 'medium'
                         WHEN priority = 'medium' THEN 'high'
                         WHEN priority = 'high' THEN 'critical'
                         ELSE priority END,
         updated_at = NOW() 
         WHERE id = $1
